changelog: âš¡ PHASE 3 POWER FEATURES: Message editing, conversation search, context menus, smart input. Message Editing: Double-click to edit user messages, shows 'Edited' badge with timestamp, PUT API endpoint at /api/messages/[id], edited_at column added to DB. Conversation Search: Ctrl+F to search, highlights matches, next/prev navigation, match counter (e.g., '3 of 12'). Context Menus: Right-click on messages (Copy, Edit, Share), conversations (Rename, Pin, Duplicate, Export, Delete), keyboard accessible. Smart Input: Autocomplete for @mentions (projects/files), /commands (/help, /clear, /export, /new, /shortcuts, /search), #tags. Tab/Enter to complete, fuzzy matching, dropdown with icons. ~1,400 lines added (9 new files). Build verified 0 errors.

mcp.reason: 66% failure rate, zero unique value vs existing RAG system

archie2.reason: Over-engineered. Simple git-based version works better

coreFeatures.rag: AutoReferenceButler - 626 lines of intelligent context gathering
coreFeatures.semanticSearch: RAG Search System - 602 lines with hybrid vector+keyword search
coreFeatures.embeddings: Embedding Cache - 445 lines with 80-90% hit rate
coreFeatures.knowledgeGraph: Knowledge Graph - 553 lines with entity/relationship tracking
coreFeatures.database: pgvector with HNSW indexes for fast similarity search
coreFeatures.archie: Simple git-based maintenance - 466 lines, hourly cron, auto-commits fixes
